actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury for fiscal years 1980 and 1981.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury and for increases required by adjustments in salaries and other employee benefits for fiscal years 1980 and 1981.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the international affairs functions of the Department of the Treasury for fiscal years 1980 and 1981.
